verbose_text: Similarly, Sanchez-Nino et al reported that the expression of TGF-beta1, CD74 and extracellular matrix protein were increased by adding lyso-Gb3 (deacylated Gb3 form) to human podocytes, showing that TGF-beta1 and CD74 are mediators of podocyte injury.
evidence: TGF-beta1 and CD74 are mediators of podocyte injury
